Text: RE Edwards AFB Conference CallHeres the email attachment XW

REBased on Bill Gangs conversation with the Air Force rep I understand that there may be interest in treating commodityrelated services as an option that can be included in the bid opportunity At any rate to make the process of filing a request with the CPUC for guidance more appeakling and sensible we have to be sure that the transaction we ask the CPUC to review is the type of transaction that the AF is actually considering for Edwards Toward the end of nailing down this important issue I am attaching my first draft of a fact sheet setting forth the particulars as they relate to Edwards and the possible transaction under consideration Regards Jim Squeri XDOC
RE edwards documentIve incorporated it and attached revised draft xdoc
